name: Dungeons of Hell'o World
description:
Clear the dungeons from army of hell to save Hell'o World!

I suggest to look at help in main menu for controls and story. The keyboard keys are these in short:
WASD to move
QE to turn
G to get an item
Space to use item
Mouse to change a character and click on things

I made this alone in 7 days for a game jam called "Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023". Some assets are from the Unity asset store. I did the rest.
